name: full-stack-open-part3
description: Git repo for full stack open part 3 (backend focussed)

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full-stack-open-course/part3/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../full-stack-open-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Aidan Clarke Scott
